title: Escape Room - Strand of Glory
author: Ttngamess
excerpt: TTN Fun Games is pleased to present "Strand of Glory," a brand-new mystery adventure game. Enter into a world of dark mysteries, unsolved puzzles, and...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: TTN Fun Games is pleased to present "Strand of Glory," a brand-new mystery adventure game. Enter into a world of dark mysteries, unsolved puzzles, and mind-bending challenges! Each level hides secrets waiting to be uncovered, and only the sharpest minds can find mystery. Run into doors and Solve tricky logic puzzles, navigate through myths and tales to break the blocks of deception, and find hidden color clues to uncover the truth. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.strandofglory Use your detective skills to find and merge pieces of clues, unlocking doors and discovering secret dark mysteries along the way of adventure. Spot different clues, find gold coins, and collect daily free rewards to keep playing. Every hidden piece matters, and every clue brings you one step closer to the truth. With smooth gameplay and an engaging story, every step brings you closer to the ultimate escape from dark rooms. Discover fascinating hidden clues, solve the puzzle, and escape before an evil entity destroys this world. To unlock the locks, apply your logical thinking skills and work through the different letter and numeric problems. Investigate the clues to solve the mysteries. Because this adventure escape game features multiple levels with unique riddles and themes, Examine, evaluate, and apply reasoning to get out of the enigmatic room. You have to locate secret rooms and navigate cryptic paths in this thrilling escape game. Can you escape? Game story: Alma discovered the grandfather's enigmatic secret regarding Bazilwood City and his twin brother, the pastor, one day. Who is pleading with the evil force to transform into a monster and use the monsters and the evil bird to destroy and wipe out this world? In order to save the world, she is prepared to journey to the cryptic Bazilwood City, where she forges perilous deals and outwits her rivals. She has to find the solutions quickly in order to rescue the world before it's too late. Game features: *50 immersive challenging levels. *A walkthrough video is available for you. *Complete puzzles, unlock hidden gameplay, and solve riddles. *Daily rewards available for free coins *Attractive variety of puzzles. *Step-by-step hints on features available *Localized in 20 major languages. *Collect tools and items to help you escape! *Find hidden objects that will help you escape! *Suitable for all genders and age ranges. *Save your progress so you can play on multiple devices! Available in 20 languages list now: English, Arabic, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Dutch, French, German, Greek, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish and Vietnamese. Share This Page

1. TTN Fun Games is pleased to present "Strand of Glory," a brand-new mystery adventure game. Enter into a world of dark mysteries, unsolved puzzles, and mind-bending challenges! Each level hides secrets waiting to be uncovered, and only the sharpest minds can find mystery. Run into doors and Solve tricky logic puzzles, navigate through myths and tales to break the blocks of deception, and find hidden color clues to uncover the truth.
    https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.strandofglory


    Use your detective skills to find and merge pieces of clues, unlocking doors and discovering secret dark mysteries along the way of adventure. Spot different clues, find gold coins, and collect daily free rewards to keep playing. Every hidden piece matters, and every clue brings you one step closer to the truth. With smooth gameplay and an engaging story, every step brings you closer to the ultimate escape from dark rooms.

    Discover fascinating hidden clues, solve the puzzle, and escape before an evil entity destroys this world.

    To unlock the locks, apply your logical thinking skills and work through the different letter and numeric problems. Investigate the clues to solve the mysteries. Because this adventure escape game features multiple levels with unique riddles and themes, Examine, evaluate, and apply reasoning to get out of the enigmatic room.

    You have to locate secret rooms and navigate cryptic paths in this thrilling escape game.
    Can you escape?

    Game story:
    Alma discovered the grandfather's enigmatic secret regarding Bazilwood City and his twin brother, the pastor, one day. Who is pleading with the evil force to transform into a monster and use the monsters and the evil bird to destroy and wipe out this world? In order to save the world, she is prepared to journey to the cryptic Bazilwood City, where she forges perilous deals and outwits her rivals. She has to find the solutions quickly in order to rescue the world before it's too late.

    Game features:
    *50 immersive challenging levels.
    *A walkthrough video is available for you.
    *Complete puzzles, unlock hidden gameplay, and solve riddles.
    *Daily rewards available for free coins
    *Attractive variety of puzzles.
    *Step-by-step hints on features available
    *Localized in 20 major languages.
    *Collect tools and items to help you escape!
    *Find hidden objects that will help you escape!
    *Suitable for all genders and age ranges.
    *Save your progress so you can play on multiple devices!
